00496     /*_ @name Parse functions
00497         These functions parse different sections of the fragment DB resource
00498         tree and translate everything into the correct data structures.
00499     */
00500     //_@{
00501 
00502     /*_ Parses the Atoms entry and creates the atoms of the fragment
00503     */
00504     void parseAtoms_(ResourceEntry& entry, Fragment& fragment);
00505 
00506     /*_ Parses the Bonds entry and creates the bonds of the fragment
00507     */
00508     void parseBonds_(ResourceEntry& entry, Fragment& fragment);
00509 
00510     /*_ Parses the properties of a fragment/variant and sets the corresponding properties.
00511         Properties are set or reset (if the property name starts with "!") for the current 
00512         fragment. All properties of fragment and residue are recognized, if they
00513         are written exactly as in the header file (case insensitive) and set.
00514         Unknown properties are set as name/value pairs as bool properties and set to 
00515         <b>  true </b>.
00516     */
00517     void parseProperties_(ResourceEntry& entry, PropertyManager& property_man);
00518 
00519     /*_ Parses the Delete section.
00520         All atoms given in this section are removed from the fragment.
00521     */
00522     void parseDelete_(ResourceEntry& entry, Fragment& fragment);
00523 
00524     /*_ Parses the Rename section.
00525         All atoms given in this section are renamed to the given new name.
00526     */
00527     void parseRename_(ResourceEntry& entry, Fragment& fragment);
00528 
00529     //_@}
00530 
00532     Position addNewFragment_(Residue* fragment);
00533 
00534     /*_ Expands all include directives in the resource file.
00535         This method calls expandFirst_ until it returns true. 
00536     */
00537     void expandTree_(ResourceEntry& root_entry);
00538    
00539     /*_ Expands the first occuring include directive.
00540         If no include directive is found, <b>  false </b> is returned, otherwise <b>  true </b>.
00541     */
00542     bool expandFirst_(ResourceEntry& root_entry)
00543       throw(Exception::FileNotFound);
